channel.title: VARC Changelog on xiv.zone
channel.description: Recent content in VARC Changelog on xiv.zone

item.description: Fixed issue when neo-ishgardian top of aiming There was a shape key used when equipping certain hand armor, and it was causing deformation. This should be looking better now.
Reverted changes to the rainbow coatee, ended up causing more problems so I left it alone. Added changes for the new streetwear top. Better Butts: Added changes for the new streetwear bottoms.

Neo-ishgardian top of aiming should now be completely fixed and free of holes. Hard leather harness is now changed. Added weight painting changes for Panthean robe of healing. Changed Street Jacket a little bit more.
Small clothes top now looks better, but it’s not completely free of artifacts yet. Added Isle Explorer’s shirt. Better Butts: The subligar override from the last update made it into VARC by mistake.
